text: Ra ndav shɨrigim, mba keman ŋgari gumgi, mbe nza mba gaar zegi ŋaneŋ gari. Mbe ne garav, ne kaŋgi fhu, nza maaŋgi fhain zegi. Mbe ne nzuav gara vov, mbɨn kama mueŋ gari. Mbe ne garim, ne guigira khɨɨna vhuuŋ ki. Mbe ana gangiap khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi, “Nza tuktɨgɨrga, nza khueŋ vuzvugi, nza kha kema ndigi ŋgɨp mbu mbasɨk taaŋ vhuuŋ phorgɨrga.”
